title: What is a Tournament code for?
body:
I just asked what, plz answered
{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

replies.body: Hmmmm I was able to reach out to our game team about that Tournament Code, and they mentioned that we don't actually use them any longer? I'm curious what code you might have, and willing to dig around a bit more to figure this out if you need!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AV1L1ARL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-24T03:44:29.418+0000)
>
> Hmmmm I was able to reach out to our game team about that Tournament Code, and they mentioned that we don't actually use them any longer? I'm curious what code you might have, and willing to dig around a bit more to figure this out if you need!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
Thats not what I meant. WHAT IS A TOURNAMENT CODE. I didnt know there were tournaments in this game. How do I get one?
Seems like he answered your question though. It's a function no longer in use.

> [{quoted}](name=AdonisLabs,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AV1L1ARL,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-24T04:56:09.139+0000)
>
> Seems like he answered your question though. It's a function no longer in use.

Oh, then I missed out on that stuff. Whatever. Looking forward to Clash.
